children.name: 粗体
children.value: **用两个 * 包含一段文本就是粗体的语法**

children.name: 斜体
children.value: *用一个 * 包含一段文本就是斜体的语法*

children.name: 表格
children.value:
| Tables | Are | Cool |
| ------------- |:-------------:| -----:|
| col 3 is | right-aligned | $1600 |
| col 2 is | centered | $12 |
| zebra stripes | are neat | $1 |

children.name: 代码框
children.value: 只需要用三个 ` 把中间的代码包裹起来

children.name: 分割线
children.value: 分割线的语法只需要三个 * 号
